message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  $12,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to stick to my budget.
